unnormalised: Arre bhai, mhakaa legit gullyaa, mhujee ₹₹ kitem thevnche mhunn. Mutual funds thode safe ashaa dishtat, punn returns tenchach 10% ashe? Aikailem ki konn konni crypto-n dhon ghaallo, jeeshe ki 5x invest menth ek vorsaache bhitor! Punn tem zaithaar volatile asa, na? 20k rupia kaim blue-chip stocks-an Zerodha-tun thevcheaach vichar asa... tum sab lokak kitem distaa? Risk tor asa, punn FD rates legit dukhi asaa 6.5% p.a.
normalised: Arre bhai, mhakaa poon mhaaje rupee khain dovrunk zataat mhunn dhondar poddlaam. Mutual funds surakshit dishtat, punn returns zaate, dha percent astale? Kain lokaan crypto-nt chali keli mhunn aikolaam, eka vorsaant paanch x tannche investment! Punn tem zaaituch volatile assa, na? Z-e-r-o-d-h-a margan vis hazar kain blue-chip stocks-ant ghalunk chint'taam... tumi soglle kitem chintatai? Risk toh asa, punn F-D rates maat sad dishtaat saah point paanch percent prati varsh.
